video_prompt: A powerful warrior steps over a fallen opponent, her intense gaze hardening. Above her raised hand, a shimmering purple energy mass expands, pulsating with power. Her maroon cape sweeps with her movement. From the incapacitated figure on the ground, purple energy strips subtly fade. In the distance, armored combatants run and clash across the desert, kicking up dust as the vibrant desert sky subtly deepens in hue.
